title: Colin From Accounts Renewed for Season 3 at Paramount+
description: One of our favorite TV imports is coming back. (Tariff-free! We think.) Paramount+ has renewed the Australian rom-com Colin From Accounts for a third season, TVLine has learned. Patrick Brammall and Harriet Dyer will return to write, executive-produce and star in the new season. Brammall and Dyer star as Gordon and Ashley, who find a […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Save the Dates: Love, Death & Robots Returns, FX’s Adults Comedy Debut and More
description: Season 4 of Love, Death & Robots will premiere Thursday, May 15, Netflix has at long last announced. “Dinosaur gladiators, messianic cats, string-puppet rock stars… it can only be Love, Death & Robots,” reads the official synopsis. The fourth volume, presented by Tim Miller (Deadpool, Terminator: Dark Fate) and David Fincher (Mindhunter, The Killer), brought back Jennifer Yuh […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Will Trent Season 3 Episode 13 Review: Rescuing Will Before The Deadly Secrets Killed Him
